PreceptDef.label: adept
PreceptDef.description:
Our adoration for the water and all life within has led us to employ new and subtle techniques for catching as many fish as possible.

<color=#E5E54C>Gameplay effect:</color>
 - Adept fishermen will be able to catch additional fish from fishing zones. These fish are considered "adept catches" and provide double nutrition from other fish in the same size category.

PreceptDef.label: forbidden
PreceptDef.description: Fish are animals, and as such fishing should be a banned activity.
